subject: BDO BANK SM City Manila Bran
body:
BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch
LG/F SM City Manila Concepcion
corner Arroceros and, San Marcelino St,
Streets, Manila, Metro Manila, Philippines
From The Desk Of Dr. Alhaji Usman
The Operation Manager BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch
Email: 
bdobankphilippin@asia.com
Telephone Number +63 981 381 2041
Office hours:
Hours:
Saturday Closed
Sunday Closed
Monday 10 am–7 pm
Tuesday 10 am–7 pm
Wednesday 10 am–7 pm
Thursday 10 am–7 pm
Friday 10 am–7 pm
Our Ref-0001/2020/KSBLP/2023
Attention Beneficiary.
We wish to inform you that your unclaimed payment of US$5.5 Million (
Five Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars ) in Asia has
been released and ready to be paid to you via PREPAID ATM VISA CARD
which you will use to withdraw the US$5.5 Million from any ATM Machine
in any part of the world.
We have mandated BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch ATM financial advisers
Philippine, to send you the ATM CARD and PIN CODE which you will use
to withdraw all your US$5.5 Million Dollars in any ATM SERVICE MACHINE
in any part of the world, but the maximum you can withdraw in a day is
US$10,000.00 Only, so please take note on that.
You are advised to re-confirm your following information below and
follow up our instructions immediately;
(1).Full name: ________________________________
(2).Address: __________________________________
(3).Telephone number: _________________________
(4).Occupation: _______________________________
(5).Age: ______________________________________
We are instructed by the Central Bank of Philippine to send you the
ATM CARD and PIN CODE which you will use to withdraw your US$5.5
Million Dollars in any ATM SERVICE MACHINE in any part of the world.
We are very sorry for the plight you have gone through in the past
years.
Thanks for adhering to these instructions and once again accepting our
congratulations. Make sure that you reply to this email address below:
bdobankphilippin@asia.com
Best Regards.
Dr. Alhaji Usman
The Operation Manager
BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch.

subject: Re:   BDO BANK SM City Manila Bran
body:
Hello Dr. Alhaji Usman,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. It's quite surprising to hear about the unclaimed payment of US $5.5 Million. I must say, it's a significant amount!

I'm curious about how this situation came to be. Could you please provide more details on why this payment has remained unclaimed?

Best wishes,
Pamela

subject: Re: Re:   BDO BANK SM City Manila Bran
body:
BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch
LG/F SM City Manila Concepcion
corner Arroceros and, San Marcelino St,
Streets, Manila, Metro Manila, Philippines

From The Desk Of Dr. Alhaji Usman
The Operation Manager BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch
Email: bdobankphilippin@asia.com
Telephone Number +63 981 381 2041

Our Ref-0001/2020/KSBLP/2023

Attention Pamela,

We are very sorry on the late response to your email, please pardon us we are too much busy with our external auditor.

We are acknowledged your email and is well noted. Regards on your question? This unclaimed funds was in our bank and registered in your name by Cambodian government. And that is the main reason why we contacted you so that you can make your claim.

The only thing we needed from you is your details below;

1. Your full name in details
2. Address
3. Telephone number
4. Occupation
5. Marital Status
6. Attached of your current ID card

Send us all the details required here, so that we can proceed on the processing of your Unclaimed funds immediately.

We are waiting for your response.

Best Regards.
Dr. Alhaji Usman
The Operation Manager
BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch

subject: Re: Re:   BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch.
body:
Hello Dr. Alhaji Usman,

Thank you for reaching out to me and explaining the situation. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear about this unclaimed fund registered in my name by Cambodian. 

Could you please provide more details about this? How did this happen? And why was it registered under my name? I'm just trying to understand the whole scenario.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Pamela

subject: Re: Re:   BDO BANK SM City Manila Bran
body:
Hello Dr. Alhaji Usman,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your time and effort in reaching out to me about this unclaimed fund.

I'm curious, how did my name come up in connection with this unclaimed fund from Cambodia? I don't recall having any connections or dealings there. Could you please provide more details on this?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the process of claiming these funds? What steps are involved and how long does it usually take?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pamela

subject: Re: Re: Re:   BDO BANK SM City Manila Bran
body:
BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch
LG/F SM City Manila Concepcion
corner Arroceros and, San Marcelino St,
Streets, Manila, Metro Manila, Philippines

From The Desk Of Dr. Alhaji Usman
The Operation Manager BDO BANK SM City Manila Branch
Email: bdobankphilippin@asia.com
Telephone Number +63 981 381 2041

Our Ref-0001/2020/KSBLP/2023

Attention Pamela,

We received your email and is well noted and acknowledged.

Thank for your urgent response on this matter, concerning your Unclaimed funds here in our bank.

Based on your question? Which we answered few of them on our previous email. This funds was originated by Cambodian government. There is a program that Cambodian government do every year. This program is done once in a year here, by balloting through World Chamber of Commerce (WCC). This means they will go through World Chamber of Commerce and get many names and email and ballot it, any person his or her name and email entered, they will made the person there foreign beneficiary. That is how this fund comes in existence. But why we called it unclaimed funds is because, the formally manager who is in charge to contact you then for this funds, refused to do so, until I entered as a new manager and see your file, then decided to contact you for it  that is where the name unclaimed funds came in.

According to your second question here? You said how long will it take and the process too. It's will take only 48 hours to process, and the process will began once you send the details that we required below for the processing.

You are advised here to get back to us with the required details, so that we can start the processing of your Unclaimed funds immediately.

Your immediate response is needed here.

Thanks.
Dr. Alhaji Usman
The Operation Manager
BDO BANK SM City Manila ranch

subject: Re: Re: Re:   BDO BANK SM City Manila Bran
body:
Hello Dr. Alhaji Usman,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's fascinating to learn about the Cambodian government's annual program and how it works through the World Chamber of Commerce. I'm also relieved to know that this process will only take a few hours.

However, I'm still a bit confused about why my name was selected in this balloting process. Could you please explain more about how the selection process works? 

Also, could you provide more information on what happens after the processing of these unclaimed funds? How would these funds be transferred to me?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Pamela

subject: Re: Re: Re:   BDO BANK SM City Manila Bran
body:
Hello Dr. Alhaji Usman,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's fascinating to learn about the Cambodian government's annual program and how it works through the World Chamber of Commerce. I'm also relieved to know that the process will only take a few hours.

However, I'm curious about a couple of things. Firstly, why was my name and email chosen for this? Is there any specific criteria or is it completely random? Secondly, could you please elaborate on what exactly these unclaimed funds are? Are they donations, grants or something else?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pamela

Attention Pamela,

I thought we have explained everything to you here, so we don't know why you are still asking questions on this transaction again, because it's well clear that this is a donation funds from Cambodian government to their foreign beneficiary.

First we told you that your name and email address was found through World Chamber of Commerce according to Cambodian government. And this program is done once a year as a donation by Cambodian government.

The processing is only taking 48 hours which is 2 days. And this fund will be processed as soon as you send your details to us.

The only thing that you need to do right now is to send all those details we requested, so that we can start the processing of your fund immediately.

Dr. Alhaji Usman
